long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recording and uploading your multi-step web transactions to your ITRS Uptrends Website Monitoring account has never been easier.

Simply hit “Star recording” navigate through your transaction steps in-browser, and click “Upload recording” after signing in to send your completed recording to your own recording queue. From your queue, submit your recording to our support engineers for review!
